EmailTemplate.subject: How to access the BlueWave Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We've processed all your necessary onboarding documents - welcome aboard! To gain access to your BlueWave Portal, please provide us with the following:
1) List of Portal Users A list of all individuals whom you'd like us to grant portal access to, including their full name, email, title, rep access (to view only their customers) or administrative access (to view all customers), and phone number (send via email).
2) A Copy of Your Company Logo (send via email)
3) Bank Info In order for us to disburse your funds, you'll need an ACH account. To set one up, please call 888-817-2703 and provide the following: - Your Bank Name - Your Bank's Routing # - Your Account #
As a reminder, please be sure to include the addendum in Exhibit D of the SSA on every customer proposal that opts for a BlueWave loan. This needs to be signed by the primary applicant as well as the co-applicant when applicable.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We're happy to help.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy. - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
